In a corner, a diminutive robot responded.

Blogans: Right away, boss!

Blogans transformed into a weird and smallish contraption, but quickly
sent a broadcast cyber alarm to the Pacificus High Command and to
every major scientist team in the world. It said that a mining team
had just discovered transformers in stasis lock. There were people
right under their feet! Maybe they could be brought back and out of
stasis?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> NPCS:
> 
> The cities had been arriesed and started to grow long time ago, rest
of a forgoten past started to appea around, specialy for the bot in
charge to seek mineral reasures for the always growing cities.
> 
> "I have sometime here" said a miner
> 
> "What it is?" said the Major Miner while he ran towars the place in
order to check it personally.
> 
> "Are... a bot... I can't belibe it!!!!!!" replied the first"It's
strange... "
> 
> "Is he ok???" said other miner
> 
> "I don't know...."replied the first"I don't know if it's in stasis
or...."
> 
> "What faction is ????"
> 
> The Major miner was lost in his thoughts, he vagely remember that a
groups of Predacons and MAximals had lost in a unknow planet... Could
be possible that...? 
> 
> "No body touch anything"he commanded"we must contac to Lord
Perseus.... and told it about it"
